NewsArticle.Title: Hunting Area, Item Durability & Monster Drop Updates
NewsArticle.Content: Updates Hunting Area Updates * Increased Experience points in East Woodlands * Increased Experience points in West Woodlands * Increased Experience points in Mileth Crypt Item Updates * Braided Vines are less likely to break * Crystal Orbs are not as fragile anymore Monster Drops * Yowien Tress will give out 2 Yowien Vines per kill (Blue or Yellow) ((This Change will take place after the reset on Friday January 22nd, 2016))
